snippet.title: A Void Hope Release Trailer
snippet.description:
A Void Hope launches on Steam, GOG and Switch February 29th.

A Void Hope takes you on an atmospheric narrative adventure to find a cure for a collapsed city. Follow the story of a tormented couple as they try to decipher reality from nightmares and evade the shadowy threats lurking in the dark.

Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2438090/A_Void_Hope/ 
Further game information: https://avoidhope.com/ 

https://twitter.com/EldenPixels 
https://www.instagram.com/eldenpixels/ 
https://facebook.com/EldenPixels/ 
https://discord.com/invite/65Y8YRN 
https://www.twitch.tv/eldenpixels
